WRITING.TEXT: Umm I havent down voted anything. You know other people can down vote too right? For the upside down crosses, they are not only used as a anti religious emphasis but... Where do you think this guy i going? hes not going up :P

Hello and thanks, The crosses sort of just happen its something I just enjoy drawing, Purely stylistic ;) Then for the hatchings, hmm well its not really markings for colors its more about balance. For me drawing this style is like disarming a bomb that will go off any second, I just keep on drawing to balance it out until the bomb is secured.
I agree, I works as a tattoo artist and this is not very suitable for a tattoo. However as this is my style I am able to change the drawings into something more tattoo-able if Im the one doing it.
No but I went to graphic design school just to get a hold of my artsyfartsyness. I have just been drawing all my life and taught myself. Just draw everyday and you will get better.
Just practice drawing classical styles and one day you will find your own thing.
Thanks man! That makes me happy to hear :)
Well I guess youll have to :) Come to Tokyo and it shall happen.
Thank you :)
Thank you!, yea that is sort of the idea, just lean back and relax because we are all going down anyways.
Thank you!
In my mind art is something that has been created by somebody that has spent an enormous amount of time perfecting his techniques and got a brilliant idea. The rest of us are just visual polluters.

Its a hard banana to crack as one would say. I do a lot of different stuff that I dont share with the internet as its just regular drawings (All kinds of styles) . I also draw on weird objects like pipes and stuff but its not interesting to see that on pictures but it looks cool in real life. I really reaaaaally want to unlock the next level of this personal drawing style, but I just cant... yet. (I am secretly trying really hard to do it though) I think it just needs to naturally happen.

Thank you! Well yes, I also think that the way the creatures are standing and the insect like legs are the problem here. I am trying to evolve but I havet found the key to that part of the brain yet haha :)
Haha, good name and thank you
Well, what would you have me do or not do?
Thank you :)

WRITING.TITLE: Female eyeball creature (semi-nsfw), Ink Copics, A4

WRITING.TEXT: Thank you, It was sort of a naming accident haha
This is me :P
Thanks man! great to hear it
Thank you!
Haha sorry, yea its more of a ram.
Do you mean part 2 as the work process thing? If not there is a part 2, It's the "make your mama proud" entry. Glad you liked it :)
Haha yea that would fit

Let me tell you this, you are on the right track. The whole trick is to learn how to draw really well at first so you get that feeling of limitlessness and then you just get lucky and find your thing pretty much. Why I have stayed with this style is because it just naturally evolved from me. It feels like I put myself on paper when I do my drawings. I did try to write a blog 1 or 2 years ago that shows how I kind of started with this. The blog ends sort of abruptly haha... but I think you will find some interesting stuff to read in it. I write about stuff from 4 years ago but its still very relevant. http://skoffee.blogspot.jp
Hope it gives you some insight :)
Thank you, well this is it: https://www.instagram.com/thedeadpigeon/
I have posted here before so it's very possible. I upload all of these drawings to instagram.

WRITING.TITLE: Rolling tentacle goat, Copic Ballpoints, A4

WRITING.TEXT: Yea, there is a white pitbull in the area that I live in that wheres little blue socks when out on a walk, so he/she sort of inspired me a little bit.
Great work, I love these :)
Haha thanks man, Im glad to hear that you like it and that you are not trying to kiss my ass:)
Yepp, it sure is
Thank you! I think my Instagram will serve you well as I have all my illustrations in this style there: https://www.instagram.com/thedeadpigeon/

WRITING.TITLE: It seems that one of my latest drawings is a good fit here.

WRITING.TEXT: It sure does, Thank you :)
Mission accomplished

"I have been a good boy, Prooooobably the best boy. Everybody loves me. Now release me."
-Im sorry for posting two things with only 8 hours in between but I really wanted to share this as well.

WRITING.TITLE: Probably the best boy, Ink Copics, A4

WRITING.TEXT: I turn the page and draw a new one. They are all in my sketchbooks :)
Thank you, glad to hear that you enjoy my drawings :)
Thanks man!

WRITING.TITLE: Little Bike Boy, Ink and Copics, A4

WRITING.TEXT: I do :) https://www.instagram.com/thedeadpigeon/
https://www.instagram.com/thedeadpigeon/
Oyes they do, all of the time.
Im working on that ;)
Thank you and Im glad to hear that its that easy to recognize by now!
haha sorry
Magic
Haha thank you! Love to hear that :D

This particular one was from just watching a bird while I was drinking coffee the same morning in a park. Usually I just try to empty my brain and draw as early in the morning as possible to be uninfluenced by my surroundings. But when I just cant figure something out I either go to a museum or something like that. As I live in Tokyo there is always something to get inspired by.
Thank you! Im very happy and glad that people like my artwork :)

Thank you! Hard question to be honest, I dont know when it goes from illustration to art. I have been drawing all my life but 98% of it is probably not really art. If you mean this particular style I think Im in year 4 now since I started it.
Thank you! I think it would be better if she paints in her own style though.
haha...
Did you look at the picture?
Hehe not weird at all and thank you but I have not read the book. I googled it now tough but those illustrations are a whole different bag of bananas ;)
Thank you :) Just keep at and eventually you will find your thing.
